title: Liverpool 0-3 Nottingham Forest, Fulham 1-0 Sunderland, and more: Premier League – live
summary: Tim de Lisle will provide live updates on goals and key moments from the afternoon matches in the Premier League and other leagues. Stay tuned for real-time coverage and insights. Don't miss out on the latest action in football!

title: Cop30 live: Deal agreed at Cop after long negotiations
summary: After intense all-night negotiations and concerns over the summit's potential failure, an agreement was successfully reached at COP30. The decision was finalized amidst heightened tensions and urgency among participants. The outcome marks a significant moment in the ongoing climate discussions.

title: Wales 26-52 New Zealand: Autumn Nations Series rugby union – live
summary: The All Blacks achieved their 34th consecutive victory over Wales in an exciting match held in Cardiff. The game showcased thrilling plays and competitive spirit. This win continues New Zealand's dominance in their long-standing rivalry with Wales.

title: Liverpool in disarray as Nottingham Forest storm Anfield again with 3-0 win
summary: Nottingham Forest secured a 3-0 victory over Liverpool at Anfield for the second consecutive year. Goals came from Murillo, Nicolò Savona, and Morgan Gibbs-White. The win highlights Forest's strong performance against a formidable opponent.

title: Ireland v South Africa: Autumn Nations Series rugby union – live
summary: Andy Farrell's team faces off against South Africa in Dublin, with Daniel Gallan providing a minute-by-minute report of the match. The clash promises to be a high-stakes encounter with both teams showcasing their strengths. Fans can expect an exhilarating matchup as Ireland takes on the formidable South African squad.
